DOC.brief_summary: This multicenter , randomize , double-blind , placebo-controlled study evaluate efficacy safety onartuzumab ( MetMAb ) combination paclitaxel plus platinum patient incurable Stage IIIB Stage IV squamous non-small cell lung cancer ( NSCLC ) . Patients randomize receive either onartuzumab ( MetMAb ) 15 mg/kg iv placebo Day 1 21-day cycle combination 4 cycle paclitaxel 200 mg/m2 iv platinum ( carboplatin/cisplatin ) iv Day 1 21-day cycle . Patients progress 4 cycle continue either onartuzumab ( MetMAb ) placebo maintenance therapy disease progression unacceptable toxicity occur .
DOC.brief_title: A Study Onartuzumab ( MetMAb ) Versus Placebo Combination With Paclitaxel Plus Platinum Patients With Squamous Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer
DOC.criteria: Adult patient , > /= 18 year age Histologically cytologically confirm Stage III B Stage IV squamous nonsmall cell lung cancer ( NSCLC ) Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ( ECOG ) performance status 0 1 No prior chemotherapy squamous NSCLC Adequate tissue central IHC assay Met receptor , EGFR test EGFR status unknown Radiographic evidence disease Prior systemic treatment Stage IIIB IV squamous NSCLC NSCLC histology classify adenocarcinoma , large cell , mixed adenosquamous , NSCLC otherwise specify ( NOS ) Prior exposure experimental treatment target either HGF Met pathway Patients tumor confirm EGFRactivating mutation suitable antiEGFR therapy ( e.g . gefitinib erlotinib ) , determine investigator Uncontrolled brain metastasis treatment neurosurgical resection brain biopsy within 4 week prior Day 1 Cycle 1 History another malignancy previous 3 year except prior history situ cancer basal squamous cell skin cancer Pregnant lactate woman Uncontrolled diabetes Impaired bone marrow , liver renal function define protocol Significant history cardiovascular disease Positive HIV infection
